AI Description: Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store that can be used as a database, cache, and message broker. It supports various data structures such as strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets with range queries, bitmaps, hyperloglogs, geospatial indexes with radius queries, and streams.
Core Features:
1. In-memory data store
2. Support for various data structures
3. Persistence options
4. Pub/Sub messaging system
5. Lua scripting
6. Built-in replication
